name: Simply Tanks
description:
((Update 7/22/22: Removed the sounds from the soldiers due to it being annoying))
It's a basic tank game. You know the rules, shoot the enemy tank to gain points and avoid mines. There are also some soldiers you need to either avoid or take out. Just make sure not to kill your own men.

Controls
Player 1,
W = Move Forward
S = Move Back
A = Turn Left
D = Turn Right
F = Fire

Player 2,
Up Arrow = Move Forward
Down Arrow = Move Back
A = Turn Left
D = Turn Right
Shift = Fire
